mil5.3.2:1.3_0: Puna ca bhaṇatha aggikkhandhūpame dhammapariyāye bhaññamāne ‘saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ mukhato uggatan’ti.
mil5.3.2:1.4_1: dhammapariyāyaṁ desentena tathāgatena saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ hitamapanetvā ahitamupadahitaṁ.
mil5.3.2:1.5_2: tena hi aggikkhandhūpame dhammapariyāye bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ mukhato uggatanti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.3.2:1.6_0: Yadi aggikkhandhūpame dhammapariyāye bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ mukhato uggataṁ,
mil5.3.2:1.6_1: tena hi tathāgato sabbasattānaṁ ahitamapanetvā hitamupadahatīti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.3.2:1.7_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.2:2.1_2: aggikkhandhūpame dhammapariyāye bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ mukhato uggataṁ,
mil5.3.2:2.1_3: tañca pana na tathāgatassa katena, tesaṁyeva attano katenā”ti.
mil5.3.2:3.1_2: api nu tesaṁ uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ mukhato uggaccheyyā”ti.
mil5.3.2:3.2_1: micchāpaṭipannānaṁ tesaṁ bhagavato dhammapariyāyaṁ sutvā pariḷāho kāye uppajji,
mil5.3.2:3.2_2: tena tesaṁ pariḷāhena uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ mukhato uggatan”ti.
mil5.3.2:3.3_1: tathāgatasseva katena tesaṁ uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ mukhato uggataṁ,
mil5.3.2:3.3_2: tathāgatoyeva tattha adhikāro tesaṁ nāsanāya, yathā nāma, bhante nāgasena, ahi vammikaṁ paviseyya,
mil5.3.2:3.3_3: athaññataro paṁsukāmo puriso vammikaṁ bhinditvā paṁsuṁ hareyya,
mil5.3.2:3.3_5: atha tattheva so assāsaṁ alabhamāno mareyya, nanu so, bhante,
mil5.3.2:4.1_3: evaṁ dhamme desīyamāne ye tattha sammāpaṭipannā, te bujjhanti.
mil5.3.2:4.3_1: purisassa ambaṁ vā jambuṁ vā madhukaṁ vā cālayamānassa yāni tattha phalāni sārāni daḷhabandhanāni,
mil5.3.2:4.3_3: yāni tattha phalāni pūtivaṇṭamūlāni dubbalabandhanāni, tāni patanti;
mil5.3.2:4.4_1: tathāgato dhammaṁ desayamāno anunayappaṭighaṁ na karoti,
mil5.3.2:4.4_3: evaṁ dhamme desīyamāne ye tattha sammāpaṭipannā, te bujjhanti.
mil5.3.2:5.2_1: tathāgato paripakkamānase satte bodhento anunayappaṭighavippamutto dhammaṁ deseti,
mil5.3.2:5.2_2: evaṁ dhamme desīyamāne ye tattha sammāpaṭipannā, te bujjhanti.
mil5.3.2:5.3_0: Ye pana micchāpaṭipannā, te tiṇāni viya maranti.
mil5.3.2:6.1_2: tesaṁ ucchuṁ pīḷayamānānaṁ ye tattha yantamukhagatā kimayo, te pīḷiyanti;
mil5.3.2:6.2_1: tathāgato paripakkamānase satte bodhento dhammayantamabhipīḷayati, ye tattha micchāpaṭipannā, te kimī viya marantī”ti.
mil5.3.2:7.2_1: tacchako rukkhaṁ tacchanto ujukaṁ parisuddhaṁ karotī”ti?
mil5.3.2:7.3_1: vajjanīyaṁ apanetvā tacchako rukkhaṁ ujukaṁ parisuddhaṁ karotī”ti.
mil5.3.2:7.4_1: tathāgato parisaṁ rakkhanto na sakkoti bodhaneyye satte bodhetuṁ,
mil5.3.2:7.4_2: micchāpaṭipanne pana satte apanetvā bodhaneyye satte bodheti, attakatena pana te, mahārāja, micchāpaṭipannā patanti.
mil5.3.2:8.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te micchāpaṭipannā,
mil5.3.2:9.1_1: corā attakatena cakkhuppāṭanaṁ sūlāropanaṁ sīsacchedanaṁ pāpuṇanti;
mil5.3.2:9.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te micchāpaṭipannā,
mil5.3.2:9.3_1: saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ uṇhaṁ lohitaṁ mukhato uggataṁ,
mil5.3.2:9.3_2: tesaṁ taṁ neva bhagavato katena, na paresaṁ katena, atha kho attanoyeva katena.
mil5.3.2:10.1_2: te taṁ amataṁ asitvā arogā dīghāyukā sabbītito parimucceyyuṁ,
mil5.3.2:10.1_3: athaññataro puriso durupacārena taṁ asitvā maraṇaṁ pāpuṇeyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja,
mil5.3.2:10.1_4: amatadāyako puriso tatonidānaṁ kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti?
mil5.3.2:10.3_1: tathāgato dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā devamanussānaṁ amataṁ dhammadānaṁ deti, ye te sattā bhabbā, te dhammāmatena bujjhanti.
mil5.3.2:10.5_2: tamekacce bhuñjitvā visūcikāya maranti, api nu kho so, mahārāja,
mil5.3.2:10.5_3: bhojanadāyako puriso tatonidānaṁ kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti?
mil5.3.2:10.7_1: tathāgato dasasahassiyā lokadhātuyā devamanussānaṁ amataṁ dhammadānaṁ deti, ye te sattā bhabbā, te dhammāmatena bujjhanti.
